title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set.
OB: An error is shown when the group dialog is not displayed. The user interface (UI) is performing validation, which is not in line with the template requirements.
EB: The group dialog should be shown regardless of whether the dataset is set or not. The UI should not perform validation in this scenario.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the application. 2. Leave the dataset field blank. 3. Attempt to open the group dialog.
